name: Reach The Moon! (itch)
description:
Made in 2 hours (approximately) for our micro-mini GMTK pre-game

A random word generator created the theme: "Moon Dash Paint"

Instructions:

WASD/Arrows + Space to move use left mouse button to draw

Art:
Yan "Kern" Gagné
http://drowtales.com/
